sms_text: Hi there, this is Nadine Khalil with KW Commercial. I recently sold a property near yours and have buyers looking for similar spaces. Would you consider selling your property in the next 3 to 6 months? Let me know if you’re interested!
email_body:
Hi there,

I’m Nadine Khalil with KW Commercial. I recently sold a property near your location and currently have several buyers interested in similar assets. I wanted to see if you might consider selling your property within the next 3 to 6 months.

If you’re open to discussing this opportunity, I’d love to connect and explore how I can assist you. Please let me know a good time to chat.

Best regards,
Nadine Khalil

email_subject: Interest in Your Property Near Recent Sale
email_body:
Hi there,

I’m Nadine Khalil with KW Commercial. I recently sold a property close to yours and currently have several buyers interested in similar commercial assets in your area. 

Would you be open to discussing the possibility of selling your property within the next 3 to 6 months? I’d be happy to provide more information and explore options with you.

Looking forward to hearing from you.
